text: AWS marketplace is a digital catalog of
software solutions that helps you
accelerate innovation by simplifying the
process of finding buying deploying and
governing software seller private offers
is a feature for AWS marketplace that
allows you to negotiate customized
pricing contractual terms and payment
schedules here's how it works
negotiate pricing contract terms and
payment schedules with a participating
software seller and they will publish
the seller private offer to the accounts
you specified in AWS marketplace then
simply follow the link provided to
accept the offer after you accept the
offer you can deploy the software under
the custom terms and pricing extended to
you by the seller you can leverage
seller private offers to purchase
several product types in AWS marketplace
including software as-a-service
Amazon machine images and more you can
also designate the specific AWS accounts
you'd like to have access to the seller
private offer and subscribe with AWS
accounts you have authorized to purchase
in AWS marketplace purchases made by
linked accounts will be reported under
your master payer account and broken out
by the account that subscribe to the
product there are many benefits to
seller private offers including a
simplified buying and contracting
process for software procurement and the
ability to negotiate annual or
multi-year pricing license terms and
flexible payment schedules with a wide
variety of software sellers AWS
marketplace and seller private offers
helps you simplify procurement by making
it easy to find by deployed and govern
the software solutions you want under
the
facing in terms you need streamline
procurement to help your business
innovate faster with seller private
offers in AWS marketplace
